nodes.text: Aurodium Sword was a mercenary faction founded by the Advanced Recon Commando Alpha-66, also known as Muzzle. Snoova was also a member. Its function was to provide security to heads of state and industry. It served both the Galactic Empire and criminal organizations. The Sienar family was one of Aurodium Sword's more notable clients.
Employees of Aurodium Sword consisted of Humans, Wookiees, and Ubese.
Ryan Kaufman got the idea for Aurodium Sword from his son, who played with a clone commander action figure backed up by three Wookiee action figures.
